topic.title: Preface

body.p: This manual is written for technical managers, device architects, firmware design leads, and hardware design leads, who are evaluating the Switchtecâ„¢ PCIe Switch Family or who are designing it into their PCIe-based products. It provides detailed information on the device architecture, features, configuration options, management interface access mechanisms, and hardware design specifications such as timing, voltage and power. Readers are expected to have a good understanding of the PCIe standard.
